ygData.subject: Re: AntiMagic Aria - Anyone figure out what it actually does yet?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have found the same thing.  I think it is broken.  I petitioned a while back when i hit 40, and a guide said he thinks it is broken too (like that helps).
ygData.messageBody:
I have found the same thing. I think it is broken. I petitioned a while
back when i hit 40, and a guide said he thinks it is broken too (like that
helps).

Shada Silverleaf, Level 46 Bard, Mithaniel Marr

> Has anyone figured out what this song actually does? It's an
